name: Earth Defender (PKGames)
description:
Hello and Welcome!

This is my first game made with ct.js (https://ctjs.rocks/). I must say I liked it (not the game, but the game editor). 

This is a simple and small shmup I  made to start get used to ct.js. For anyone starting to make games, I recomend this tool. It's easy to use, clean and powerful. 

Sprites made by ansimuz (https://ansimuz.itch.io/).

Have fun.
